titleStmt.title: Baby-baptism meer babism, or, An answer to nobody in five words to every-body who finds himself concern'd in't by Samuel Fisher.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Samuel, 1605-1665.

titleStmt.title: Baby-baptism meer babism, or, An answer to nobody in five words to every-body who finds himself concern'd in't by Samuel Fisher.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Samuel, 1605-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and are to be sold by Will. Larner and Richard Moon,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Paidobaptezontes paidizontes.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

(from t.p.) Anti-diabolism, or, The true account of a dispute at Ashford proved a true counterfeit--Anti-babism, or, The babish disputings of the preists [sic] for baby-baptism disproved--Anti-rantism, or, Christ'sndome unchrist'ned-Antiranterism or, Christ'ndome newchrist'nd--Anti-sacer dotism, the deep dotage of the dddivines discovered, or, The antichristian ccclergy cleared to be that themselves, which ever charged Christs clergy to be.
